summary.span: 允许控制代码访问安全权限。

span.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类使用序号排序规则对字符串进行比较，并忽略所比较的字符串的大小写。The class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared. ## Examples 下面的示例从类继承 。The following example inherits from the class. 实现了4类构造函数。4 kinds of constructors are implemented. 该示例还提供了一个名为的类的实现 `MailslotPermissionEntry` 。The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 然后，将 属性私下设置为的类型 `MailslotPermissionEntry` 。The property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 该 属性专用于 "名称" 和 "计算机"。The property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine". [!code-cpp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CPP/resourcepermissionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CS/resourcepermissionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/VB/resourcepermissionbase.vb#1)]

span.span: The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries.

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
A copy of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限对象的副本表示与原始权限对象相同的资源访问权限。A copy of the permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限对象类型相同的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 创建并返回作为当前权限对象和目标权限对象的交集的权限对象。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

returns.span: 表示当前对象和指定目标交集的新权限对象。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此对象为 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限对象的交集是描述它们共同拥有的一组操作的权限。The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common. 具体而言，它表示请求同时传递两个权限所需的最小权限。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.

exception.span: 目标权限对象与当前权限对象不属于同一类型。

span.span: The target permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将用于测试子集关系的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

summary.span: 确定当前权限对象是否是指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限对象是指定权限对象的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限对象指定的一组操作完全包含在指定的权限对象中，则当前权限对象是指定权限对象的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示对 C:\Example.txt 的访问权限的权限是表示 C：访问权限的权限的子集 \\ 。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回 `true` ，则当前权限对象表示对受保护资源的访问权限，而不是指定的权限对象。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object. `false`如果指定的权限对象的类型与当前权限对象的类型不同，则此方法始终返回。This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制权限对象表示对受权限保护的任何资源和所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission object represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前的权限对象合并的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限对象的类型相同。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 创建将当前权限对象与目标权限对象组合的权限对象。

span.span: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.

returns.span: 新权限对象，它表示当前权限对象和指定权限对象的并集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果 是代表当前权限对象和指定权限对象表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 权限对象与当前权限对象不属于同一类型。

span.span: The permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.
